atk_abil: Normal Attack: Hurls multiple magic missiles that attack enemies.
Skill Attack: Casts a huge leafe Shuriken that slows and knocks back enemies. Enemies that are knocked back have a certain chance to be bound and receive additional damage over time.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 6%, increases elf attack speed and movement speed by 5%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.

Elf's Secret SKill of Space-Time: For every 100 stages, there is a certain chance to skip 20 stages. (3% chance for every 5-star unit and 5% for every 6-star unit which are only applied when they are in the team.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Hurls multiple magic missiles that attack enemies.
Skill Attack: Casts a huge leafe Shuriken that slows and knocks back enemies. Enemies that are knocked back have a certain chance to be bound and receive additional damage over time.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 11%, increases elf attack speed and movement speed by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.

Elf's Secret SKill of Space-Time: For every 100 stages, there is a certain chance to skip 20 stages. (3% chance for every 5-star unit and 5% for every 6-star unit which are only applied when they are in the team.

buffs.description: For every 100 stages, there is a chance to skip 20 stages. (5-star 3%, 6-star 5%, only applied when they are in the team).
buffs.name: Elf's Secret Skill of Space-Time
